mapper.insert: insert into o_order_detail (ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_CNT, GOODS_PRICE, AVERAGE_COST, WEIGHT, DISTRICT_MONEY, WHID, MODIFIED_TIME) values (#{orderDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{averageCost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{districtMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{whid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update o_order_detail set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_CNT = #{goodsCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AVERAGE_COST = #{averageCost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, DISTRICT_MONEY = #{districtMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHID = #{whid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_CNT, GOODS_PRICE, AVERAGE_COST, WEIGHT, DISTRICT_MONEY, WHID, MODIFIED_TIME from o_order_detail where ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
